title: Some of our items
description: Here is a collection of some of our healthy, delicious and local Canadian snacking options are your employees are sure to love!

products.title: Covered Bridge Sweet Potato Chips
products.description: A chip with the perfect blend of sweet and salty. A crowd favourite!

products.title: Crunchmaster's Crisps
products.description: The mini hexagon-shaped cracker with the big multi-grain taste.  A healthy option for the smart snacker!

products.title: Simply Bar
products.description: SimplyProtein snacks are light and crunchy. High in protein and fiber, and low in sugar!

products.title: Skinny Pop Popcorn
products.description: Premium popcorn kernel, sunflower oil and the perfect amount of salt.  No GMOs, gluten or preservatives!

products.title: Snapea Crisps
products.description: Classic, natural and sprinkled with salt for a taste you can always rely on.

products.title: Soo Jerky Salmon Jerky
products.description: Regular, Black Pepper and Hot flavours. Everything you need to have a delicious & healthy protein snack!

products.title: Sunflower Crackers Strawberry Sandwich
products.description: Strawberries & cream, what a dream!  Sunflower crackers satisfy your fruit cravings with a healthy crisp!

products.title: Trancetto Cacao Snack Sponge Cake
products.description: The Trancetto Cocoa is comprised of slice of chocolate and classic sponge cake filled with a low-fat chocolate filling.

products.title: Umpquoa Oats
products.description: With Umpqua, you get thick, nutritious whole oats - and zero processed oats or other fillers!

products.title: Want Want Rice Crackers
products.description: Never feel guilty snacking with Want Want Rice Crackers. A light way to get through the day!

products.title: Hidden Garden Chocolate Chip Cookies
products.description: This tasty chocolate chip cookie has the added benefit 1/4 cup of pumpkin in each serving!

products.title: Late July Mini Sandwich Crackers
products.description: These organic bite size sandwiches will be sure to satisfy your taste buds!

products.title: Missy's Waffle Cookies
products.description: A perfect treat for any time of the day! Drizzled with icing and baked to perfection.

products.title: PapaJack Popcorn Butter
products.description: A true classic, PapaJack Popcorn is a great snack to bring fun into the workplace! Made in Ottawa.

products.title: Zevia Soda
products.description: Zevia Soda's are loaded with flavour and made with all natural ingredients.

products.title: PopCorners
products.description: At PopCorners, they're changing snack time for the better. PopCorners are the delicious, wholesome snack that makes it easier than ever to snack better.

products.title: Vitali-T Oatmeal Cookies
products.description: This low fat cookie is the perfect guilt-free snack!

products.title: Wild Roots Coastal Berry Natural Trail Mix
Buddha Bowl Popcorn
products.description: Buddha Bowl brings you organic, low fat & healthy popcorn treats with no compromise for flavor!

products.title: Nature's Path Organic Chewy Granola Bars
products.description: Two healthy flavours including Pumpkin -N- Spice and Sunny Hemp!

products.title: Kashi Seven Grain with Quinoa Bars
Oatbox Cereal Bars
products.description: Skipped breakfast? These cereal bars are the perfect solution.

products.title: Farm to Table Popcorn
products.description: Farm To Table Foods prides itself on seeking out the purest ingredients available. This popcorn is made from Ontario corn!

products.title: Roasted Chickpeas Three Farmers
products.description: A sweet, salty, or tangy flavour that's a perfect snack for a day in the park or at the big game, proudly Canadian.

products.title: JIMMYBAR!
products.description: Gluten-free, dairy-free. This bar is ridiculously healthy! Perfect for a mid-day snack.

products.title: Gogo Quinoa Cookies
products.description: Flavours include the classic Chocolate chip and Orange Essence. These gluten-free cookies are sure to satisfy any afternoon craving!

products.title: G.H. Cretors 42g
products.description: Made in an old fashioned copper kettle, this popcorn is simply delicious.

products.title: Krave Jerky Sticks
products.description: The KRAVE Stick is an evolution of the traditional meat snack that is layered with unexpected ingredients.

products.title: Enjoy Life Mini Cookies
products.description: Enjoy these allergy-friendly, gluten-free cookies as a perfect afternoon snack!

products.title: Clif Energy Bar
products.description: It’s the first bar we made, and it’s still everything we are about. Wholesome ingredients. Performance nutrition. And great taste.

products.title: Betty Lou's PB&J Bar
products.description: Our PB&J Bar is the perfect healthy snack for vegans. It contains 5 grams of protein, is gluten-free, and is non-GMO.

products.title: Simple Squares
products.description: Healthy, superfood protein bars that are Paleo, organic, Non-GMO, and gluten-free. Natural ingredients to help satisfy your snack craving in a healthy way.

products.title: Bobo's Oat Bars
products.description: Every Bobo’s product is made with nourishing ingredients that you probably already have in your own pantry. Delicious!

products.title: Bounce Protein Ball
products.description: Perfect after a morning workout session or just for the everyday grind!

products.title: Wise Bites Oat & Quinoa Bars
products.description: Wise Bites is a baker and distributor of delicious, healthy food products based in Richmond, B.C. Aiming to make it easy for people to make healthy choices.

products.title: Vita Coco Coconut Water
products.description: Vita Coconut water is a great way to refresh with a taste of the tropics!

products.title: Praeventia Cookies
products.description: Our cookies contain 70% cocoa dark chocolate, cranberries, antioxidants, green tea extract, inulin, red wine extract and whole grains! Theres awesomeness in every bite.

products.title: Pressed by KIND
products.description: Not-so-standard fruit snack that's as easy as it is amazing.

products.title: Pomegranate Green Iced Tea
products.description: Kiju's Ice Teas are packed with delicious, healthy, and refreshing fruity flavours.  You'll be back at the fridge soon for another!

products.title: Justin's PB Cups
products.description: Selectively chosen & naturally delicious ingredients creating the best peanut butter cups you'll ever have!

products.title: Martin's Apple Chips
products.description: Martins crispy apple chips bring all the goodness of their orchard to you! Anytime & anywhere!

products.title: 24/7 Snacks
products.description: Proudly Canadian, these snacks are a very tasty gluten-free and dairy free option!

products.title: Blue Monkey Baked Coconut Chips
products.description: 100% Natural baked coconut chips without preservatives. A great snack or anytime topping.

products.title: ShaSha Ginger Snaps
products.description: Perfect for an afternoon snack! Flavours include Original, Organic Spelt Lemon & Organic Spelt Ginger

products.title: PopCorners Chips
products.description: PopCorners are the delicious, wholesome snack that makes it easier than ever to snack better.

products.title: Sapsucker Maple Water
products.description: Sapsucker's maple infused water is as Canadian as it gets!  Our favourite sweet treat mixed in with refreshing water.

products.title: Hardbite Chips
products.description: Sliced thick, cooked in small batches and bursting with flavour!

products.title: Taste of Nature Granola Bars
products.description: ‘They’ say “an apple a day keeps the doctor away”. Well, eating your apples has never been so easy with this new spiced up snack.

products.title: NAGI ORGANIC MAKAROONS
products.description: These nutrient dense “power balls” are power packed and will satisfy your sweet tooth without sending your blood sugar soaring!

products.title: Garden Veggie Chips
products.description: Our airy, light, and crunchy Chips combine garden-grown potatoes and ripe vegetables to form a healthy snack!

products.title: Enjoy Life Seed & Fruit Mix
products.description: A yummy medley perfect for those with nut allergies! Two flavours include Beach Bash & Mountain Mambo

products.title: Patience Fruit & Co. Three Berry Blend
products.description: This exclusive blend of three berries offers a surprising combination of flavours including <meta charset="utf-8">organic wild blueberries.

products.title: Plentils Chips
products.description: Enjoy Life Foods has captured the essence of this vital legume’s all-natural goodness and turned it into a unique, protein-packed, crunchy experience.

products.title: HoneyBar
products.description: Manufactured in Ottawa, these snack bars are made solely from natural whole foods!

products.title: MadeGood Crispy Squares
products.description: MadeGood® Crispy Squares are a healthy take on everyone’s favorite childhood snack!

products.title: Betty Lou's Smackers
products.description: <meta charset="utf-8">Protein-rich naturally delicious treats with no trans fats or preservatives. Truly nutritious and delicious!

products.title: Enjoy Life Gluten-Free Chewy Bars
products.description: These bars are the perfect snack wherever and whenever! Brand new flavours include Lemon Blueberry Poppyseed, Chocolate Chip Caramel and Carrot Cake.

products.title: Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP
products.description: Real, simple ingredients. Nothing fake.

products.title: Gorilly Goods
products.description: Organic. Non-GMO. Raw. Vegan. Pure ingredients. Flavour. Sustainability.

products.title: Taste of Nature Exotic Organic Bars
products.description: The unmistakable taste of maple any time of day. Taste of Nature's 100% certified organic exotic bars are Kosher, non-GMO and are made with the very best ingredients. Made in Canada.

products.title: Kind Bar
products.description: Whole nuts bound in honey that make this a snack that’s easy to recognize and enjoy. What’s not to love?

products.title: Clif Crunch Bar
products.description: CLIF CRUNCH—a crunchy, delicious snack bar that provides you with the energy you need whatever the adventure (or workload) !

products.title: Hippie Snacks Organic Sesame Snack
products.description: These SESAME SNACKS are made with crunchy white and black organic sesame seeds sweetened with coconut sugar.

products.title: Vegan Robs Rice Chips
products.description: Good, green, and antioxidant rich! Every bite is tasty and healthy.

products.title: Kewaza Energy Balls
products.description: Fuel your day with Kewaza bites made from certified organic ingredients.

products.title: Nature's Path Love Crunch Bars
products.description: These premium organic granola bars will keep you going during the long days at the office!

products.title: MadeGood Granola Minis
products.description: Peanut free organic snack that really hits the spot!

products.title: Kind Healthy Grain Bars
products.description: Baked with at least five super grains to create a unique chewy and crunchy texture. Each bar has at least a full serving of whole grains.

products.title: Rip Van Wafels
products.description: <meta charset="utf-8">Enjoy this seriously tasty stroopwafel anytime you are craving sweets!

products.title: Rise Kombucha
products.description: RISE Kombucha is a probiotic super-drink that packs a mean punch when it comes to flavour.

products.title: Terra Chips
products.description: <meta charset="utf-8">Real vegetable chips made with parsnip, taro, sweet potato, yuca & batata.

products.title: Enerjive Quinoa Crackers Chocolate
products.description: These tasty gluten-free crackers will be sure to boost your energy! Made in Ottawa.

products.title: Bakery on Main Gluten-Free Granola Bars
products.description: Loaded with the bakeshop delicious flavors you love, they are a perfect to start your morning or for a quick on the go snack!

products.title: Sips Coffee
products.description: Locally roasted fresh coffee directly from Canada's capital.

products.title: Nature's Bakery Fig Bars
products.description: There's no compromise here! Nature's Bakery fig bars deliver you an organic, delicious & healthy snack option.

products.title: Pur Popcorn
products.description: A brand new product from The PUR Company! All natural flavours, highest quality ingredients and a great taste!

products.title: Made Good Granola Bar
products.description: These wholesome granola bars are perfect for a mid-morning pick me up. They’ll leave you feeling full and happy on the inside.

products.title: Covered Bridge Chips
products.description: Made in New Brunswick, these old fashioned kettle style chips are gluten-free & all natural!

products.title: Glutino Breakfast Bars
products.description: These gluten-free bars are perfect for those busy office mornings!

products.title: Kettle Foods Natural Gourmet Chips
products.description: Kettle Foods uses only the freshest, all-natural ingredients to create intensely flavored, wonderfully craveable potato chips you can feel good about eating!

products.title: Awake Chocolate
products.description: A delicious chocolate bar with the same amount of caffeine as a regular cup of joe!

products.title: Quinoa Cookies
products.description: These crunchy cookies, made with quinoa flour win you over with their rich and chocolaty taste.  Vegan & gluten free!

products.title: Brookside Chocolate
products.description: Delectable berries, wrapped in dark Chocolate.  A pleasure for the taste buds!

products.title: Neal Brothers Chips
products.description: Neal Brothers believes in offering brands that add flavour and offer something unique to the marketplace.

products.title: Steaz Ice Tea
products.description: Steaz iced teas & flavoured waters are packed with great flavour, and are great for you!

products.title: G.H Cretors Popcorn
products.description: G.H Cretors Popcorn

products.title: Whole Almonds
products.description: Whole Almonds

products.title: Perrier Cans
products.description: A classic refreshing drink.  Perrier is awesome for when you're looking for a bit more of a spark in your drink.

products.title: Trail Mix
products.description: Trail Mix

products.title: CLIF Bar
products.description: Wholesome ingredients. Performance nutrition. And great taste.  A great way to boost energy!
